Name: Razor
Description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

Skills.Name: Normal Attack: Steel Fang
Skills.Description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. 

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Descriptions: Energy Recharge Bonus|{param3:P} per Electro Sigil
Energy Regenerated|{param4:F1} per Electro Sigil Absorbed

Skills.Name: Claw and Thunder
Skills.Description: #Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his lupical. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to opponents in front of Razor. Upon striking an opponent, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate. Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration. Hold Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils. Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor. In the moment when lightning strikes, you can sometimes glimpse the look of a predator sizing up his prey deep within Razor's eyes.

Descriptions: Soul Companion DMG|{param2:F1P} Normal Attack DMG

EnergySkill.Name: Lightning Fang
EnergySkill.Description: Summons the Wolf Within, which deals Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into Elemental Energy for him. The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration. The Wolf Within ·Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG. ·Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES. ·Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status. ·Disables Razor's Charged Attacks. ·Increases Razor's resistance to interruption. These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield. When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill. The wolf has awoken. The hunt is on.

Inherents.Name: Awakening
Inherents.Description:
Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color>'s CD by 18%.
Using <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color> resets the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color>.

Inherents.Name: Hunger
Inherents.Description: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

Inherents.Name: Wolvensprint
Inherents.Description:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

Talents.Name: Wolf's Instinct
Talents.Description: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

Talents.Name: Suppression
Talents.Description: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

Talents.Name: Soul Companion
Talents.Description:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Talents.Name: Bite
Talents.Description: #When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color> ({LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press}), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

Talents.Name: Sharpened Claws
Talents.Description:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Talents.Name: Lupus Fulguris
Talents.Description:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.
When Razor is not using <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color>, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color>.

FetterInfo.Title: Wolf Boy
FetterInfo.Detail: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

Fetters.Title: Hello
Fetters.Context: You smell... *sniff* nice! Let's hunt.

Fetters.Title: Chat: Scent
Fetters.Context: *sniff* I smell rabbit.

Fetters.Title: Chat: Hunger
Fetters.Context: I'm hungry. Let's hunt.

Fetters.Title: Chat: Wind-gazing
Fetters.Context: I keep watch. You leave, you call me.

Fetters.Title: When Thunder Strikes: Warning
Fetters.Context: If you're scared of lightning, hide now.

Fetters.Title: When Thunder Strikes: Guidance
Fetters.Context: Avoid the trees. Follow me.

Fetters.Title: When It's Windy
Fetters.Context: Wind... I like the wind.

Fetters.Title: When the Wind Is Blowing
Fetters.Context: The wind... bites hard.

Fetters.Title: Good Morning
Fetters.Context: The sun is up. Time to hunt.

Fetters.Title: Good Afternoon
Fetters.Context: I had a big lunch. Lots of meat. Mm, I'm happy.

Fetters.Title: Good Evening
Fetters.Context: Go to sleep. I watch the moon.

Fetters.Title: Good Night
Fetters.Context: You sleep now. I keep watch.

Fetters.Title: About Razor
Fetters.Context: I have no human family. I am a wolf.

Fetters.Title: About Us: Friends
Fetters.Context: You are my friend. We can hunt. Together!

Fetters.Title: About Us: Weapons
Fetters.Context: I have iron claws and teeth of thunder. I protect you.

Fetters.Title: About the Vision
Fetters.Context: Vision helps Razor... fight with lightning tooth! Protect Lupical!

Fetters.Title: Something to Share
Fetters.Context: I like the stars at night. So many stars. In the sky, in the lake. And in the city.

Fetters.Title: Interesting Things
Fetters.Context: The wolves are my Lupical. My family.

Fetters.Title: About Lisa
Fetters.Context: Lisa lightning makes the sky black. She is strong. She is scary.

Fetters.Title: About Barbara
Fetters.Context: Shining Barbara is a good child. Very good child.

Fetters.Title: About Diluc
Fetters.Context: Diluc is red and black. Hot and cold.

Fetters.Title: About Venti
Fetters.Context: Razor doesn't know poems, but... Lupical likes them.

Fetters.Title: About Bennett
Fetters.Context: Bennett... Much talking. Eat with him, never full.

Fetters.Title: About Klee
Fetters.Context: Klee, friend! Friend, but... big hassle.

Fetters.Title: About Varka: Stranger
Fetters.Context: Varka? Razor doesn't know...

Fetters.Title: About Varka: Memory
Fetters.Context: Oh, Varka is... a name. That man big. Big steelclaw, Razor's name — Varka gave him. Oh... want to see him.

Fetters.Title: More About Razor: I
Fetters.Context: *sniff* Hmm... You smell kind. Do you like meat?

Fetters.Title: More About Razor: II
Fetters.Context: You are strong. Like a wolf. I like to hunt with you. We catch a lot.

Fetters.Title: More About Razor: III
Fetters.Context: Lupical means wolf home— no, Lupical means wolf family. My Lupical lives in the woods. They say I am their Lupical.

Fetters.Title: More About Razor: IV
Fetters.Context: My Lupical is my only family. But I don't have four legs, not like them. Because I'm not a real wolf. Sometimes, this makes me sad.

Fetters.Title: More About Razor: V
Fetters.Context: When I run with you, when I hunt with you, I am happy. With you, I am not a wolf, I am not a boy, I am just me. I am Razor. Because you are my friend. You are my Lupical. I hope you feel happy, too!

Fetters.Title: Razor's Hobbies
Fetters.Context: I like Lupical. I like the woods. I like my friend. I like to run!

Fetters.Title: Razor's Troubles
Fetters.Context: Talking makes me tired. Talking is... hard. But... I have to try.

Fetters.Title: Favorite Food
Fetters.Context: I like meat, and... I like potatoes.

Fetters.Title: Least Favorite Food
Fetters.Context: Greens are bad. Animal eats green things. Then I eat animal!

Fetters.Title: Receiving a Gift: I
Fetters.Context: Smells good, also tastes good, I like it.

Fetters.Title: Receiving a Gift: II
Fetters.Context: Eating this gives me energy, makes me happy.

Fetters.Title: Receiving a Gift: III
Fetters.Context: Eating it, bad. Not eating it, also bad. I'm a bit sad.

Fetters.Title: Birthday
Fetters.Context: Today is your day. You were born on this day, many moons ago. I want to make you happy today. Can we eat meat together?

Fetters.Title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
Fetters.Context: Arms... bigger!

Fetters.Title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
Fetters.Context: Grr! Sharpen claws. Sharpen teeth. Become stronger!

Fetters.Title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
Fetters.Context: Run... Hunt... No. No! Must... become stronger!

Fetters.Title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
Fetters.Context: Teeth. Claws. Legs. All bigger. All stronger! To protect you.

Fetters.Title: Elemental Skill: I
Fetters.Context: Get back!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Skill: II
Fetters.Context: Ah!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Skill: III
Fetters.Context: Heyah!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Skill: IV
Fetters.Context: Keep back!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Burst: I
Fetters.Context: Raaaarrr!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Burst: II
Fetters.Context: *howls*

Fetters.Title: Elemental Burst: III
Fetters.Context: *roars*

Fetters.Title: Elemental Burst: IV
Fetters.Context: Rar!

Fetters.Title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
Fetters.Context: These things... useful?

Fetters.Title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
Fetters.Context: Empty chest... good for storage.

Fetters.Title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
Fetters.Context: Smell of treasure... strange.

Fetters.Title: Low HP: I
Fetters.Context: Argh!

Fetters.Title: Low HP: II
Fetters.Context: *grunt* A-a-awoooo!

Fetters.Title: Low HP: III
Fetters.Context: I kill you!

Fetters.Title: Ally at Low HP: I
Fetters.Context: No!

Fetters.Title: Ally at Low HP: II
Fetters.Context: Wake up!

Fetters.Title: Fallen: I
Fetters.Context: Can't... breathe...

Fetters.Title: Fallen: II
Fetters.Context: Take me back...

Fetters.Title: Fallen: III
Fetters.Context: Lupical... my Lupical...

Fetters.Title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
Fetters.Context: I taste blood...

Fetters.Title: Joining Party: I
Fetters.Context: I'll scout ahead.

Fetters.Title: Joining Party: II
Fetters.Context: We're going to hunt!

Fetters.Title: Joining Party: III
Fetters.Context: I'll watch your back.

FetterStories.Title: Character Details
FetterStories.Context:
Razor is a boy whose identity is shrouded in mystery. He lives in Wolvendom and is rarely spotted by the citizens of Mondstadt.
According to a handful of eyewitness accounts, Razor has keen senses and is highly agile, traversing the forest at breakneck speed. He is often seen in the company of his wolf pack, while generally avoiding contact with humans.
Some speculate that he was an orphan raised by the wolves, while others say he is a wolf spirit that has taken on a human form.
Such rumors only add to the mystery of the "Wolf Boy," as the denizens of Mondstadt call him.
Meanwhile, Razor the Wolf Boy stands all the while on the hilltops with his head held high, basking in the warm sunlight.

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 1
FetterStories.Context:
Razor lives among the wolves night and day.
All of them are as close with Razor as they could possibly be. Which wolf has the loudest howl, which wolf runs the fastest, which wolf is the best at ambushing — there isn't a wolf Razor doesn't know.
He can sense the mood of the wind, smell a scent from miles away, and knows many practical applications for plants of all kinds. The one thing he can't bring to mind is the faces of his parents.
What kind of people were they? No matter how hard he tries, he cannot remember.
His memory starts after his life with the wolves had already begun. The wolves took him in as part of their "Lupical" — a word he was taught by someone else, which means family.

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 2
FetterStories.Context:
Tiny singing things are flying in the sky.
The clouds are long and fluffy, like a wolf's tail.
Razor's world is a simple one.
On a sunny day, you run around hunting or try and beat your prey to the ripe fruits. On a rainy day, you hide out in a hollow tree and fall asleep hugging a furry lupine friend, with some grass and leaves for a pillow.
Eat as much as you can and drink plenty of water. Cool off in the lake when you're hot, and go find some juicy berries when you're thirsty.
Razor looks at his body and then at the bodies of his kin.
He knows he is different from them.
But there's nothing wrong with that, as far as Razor is concerned.

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 3
FetterStories.Context:
One day, a tall man came to the mountains and disrupted Razor's peaceful life.
Razor did not know who the man was, only that he was a human. Seeing the confused look on Razor's face, the man gave him a friendly smile.
"Hey buddy! Why don't you come back down to Mondstadt with me?"
The man offered his hand to Razor as he spoke.
But neither Razor nor the wolves understood the gesture. Feeling protective, the wolves placed themselves between Razor and the man to keep him away.
Razor ducked down beneath the wolves' furry tails. He looked at his body, and then peered out through the gaps in the wolf fur to get a look at the man's.
Razor knew he wasn't the most intelligent of beings, and was at a loss to answer the question that has been in his mind ever since that day.
"Am I a human, or a wolf?"

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 4
FetterStories.Context:
It was that man who gave Razor his name.
The simple Wolf Boy could not understand the intricacies of human language, but he knew from the look on the man's face when he produced this sound that the man was giving him a name.
"Rae-zer."
The shadows cast by the trees of Wolvendom grew short, and then grew long again.
The man taught Razor how to swing a sword. Unwieldy though this steel claw may be, thought Razor, it was at least sharp enough to cut through tree branches.
"Now you can protect your friends."
"Fr-ren-dzz..."
Razor imitated the sounds the man made, without understanding what they meant.
Similarly, he did not understand why the names of things were all that important in the first place. After all, he never learned the name of that man before he left.

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 5
FetterStories.Context:
"Master, what is... 'friends'?"
Razor once asked of his new mentor, working at the limits of his vocabulary.
His purple-clothed mentor seemed to know it all, from how to make hash browns from potatoes in the ground, to the name of the brightest star in the summer night sky.
However, Lisa simply smiled and yawned without answering him.
Razor thought about it when the wind blew, when the rain fell — even when Wolfhook berries got stuck in his fur. He just couldn't figure it out.
Until one day, Razor met a bright-red, 'burny' girl.
They stood in the wind together, got soaked in the rain together — she even rolled around in Wolfhook bushes with him.
Her name was Klee. When Razor played with her, it was like being a wolf pup again.
"Friends... is... Lupical."
Razor may not understand the complexity of human relationships, but he has an honest, primal loyalty to him.
"So... protect friends... Lupical... with life."
The wolf pack howls in the distance, summoning him home.
Razor still does not know if he is a human or a wolf.
But he is happy either way.

FetterStories.Title: Razor's Crude Wooden Crate
FetterStories.Context:
In a box so crudely made that one has to be extra careful when opening it lies Razor's greatest treasures.
The broken-off hilt of a greatsword, a children's storybook called The Wolf and the Windwheel Aster, and a dry, withered four-leaf clover.
Though he understands neither the intricacies of human relations nor the ways of the world, Razor knows that these are gifts from the ones known as 'friends' — and that is what makes them his most treasured possessions of all.

FetterStories.Title: Vision
FetterStories.Context:
The story of how Razor got his Vision is one of the few memories that he wishes he could forget.
One day, during a lightning storm, an Abyss Mage ambushed Razor from behind and dragged him away. The wolf pack ran to his aid and put up a fearless fight, but every last one of them was defeated by the Abyss Mage.
As he looked on helplessly at his dear companions being harmed, Razor let out an almighty roar like that of a cornered animal.
"Lupical!"
Fueled by his almighty fury, a lightning-like power grew inside, and suddenly an overload of elemental energy was flowing within him.
He was ready to protect. He was ready to avenge.
He threw off his shackles and raised his weapon.
The Abyss Mage was overwhelmed and defeated by a wild, unfettered frenzy of Electro energy, but this time it was too late to save Razor's wolven companions.
...
Though he had obtained a Vision, Razor was still unable to manipulate Electro energy with finesse. One day many moons later, when he met the Witch of Purple Rose, Lisa, he began to study human knowledge.
"Friends, hurt... Never again! I will... protect them."
With each day, Razor grew more skilled in the use of his Vision. He made a silent promise to himself: "I will become stronger. I will become the strongest of them all."
Because the day may come when his Lupical faces another threat, and this time, he will protect them.

Costumes.Name: Wild Sprint
Costumes.Description: Razor's outfit. Rough and ready clothes suited for running out in the wilderness.

NameCard.Name: Razor: Wolvensprint
NameCard.Description:
Namecard style.
It's quite a sight to behold Razor and the wolves prepare their dinner, but they won't let Klee or the Traveler see the slightly gruesome affair.
